io.github.trulyfree.modular.display

Interface Display<T extends Displayable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of displayable supported by the display.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Module

    public interface Display<T extends Displayable>
extends Module
    Display interface. All Modular programs with displays should define an implementation of this interface. The task of the implementation is to parse and display DisplayableModules provided by the module.
    Author:
    vtcakavsmoace

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DisplayableModule<T> getDisplayableModule()
      Method to be called in order to get the current DisplayableModule being displayed by this display.
      boolean setDisplayableModule(DisplayableModule<T> module)
      Method to be called in order to set the current DisplayableModule being displayaed by this display.

      • Methods inherited from interface io.github.trulyfree.modular.module.Module

        destroy, isReady, setup

    • Method Detail

      • getDisplayableModule

        DisplayableModule<T> getDisplayableModule()
        Method to be called in order to get the current DisplayableModule being displayed by this display.
        Returns:
        displayableModule The DisplayableModule currently being displayed by this display.

      • setDisplayableModule

        boolean setDisplayableModule(DisplayableModule<T> module)
                      throws DisplayableException
        Method to be called in order to set the current DisplayableModule being displayaed by this display. This method should single-handledly perform parsing and rendering for the display. If this method fails, it should revert to the previous setup to prevent unresolvable module or screen problems.
        Parameters:
        module - The DisplayableModule which is attempting to be displayed.
        Returns:
        success The success of this operation. This should return true unless the display is locked into a DisplayableModule.
        Throws:
        DisplayableException - if the parsing operation throws a throwable.
